name: amazonproductreviews
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool amazon_product_reviews.
Tool description: Amazon Product Reviews
Contact me at: vuesdata@gmail.com or visit https://www.vuesdata.com for building custom spiders or custom requests.
API description: It will accept three parameters asin, domain, pageNum.
For Ex:
asin: B087N3LWRB  (you can find it in the product page of amazon)
domain: amazon.co.uk  (put the domain without www, currently we only provide amazon.com, amazon.in and amazon.co.uk)
pageNum: 1 (min 1 and max depends on the number of reviews on the product.  Each page give 10 reviews)

pagenum.description: The page number of reviews to retrieve. Each page contains 10 reviews.

domain.description: The Amazon domain to query reviews from (e.g., 'amazon.com', 'amazon.in', 'amazon.co.uk').

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) of the product to retrieve reviews for.
